channel.description: Recent content in journal on Jeremy Elkayam

item.title: I Made a Website
item.description: Hi, it’s me, Jeremy Elkayam. I made a website because I figured it was time I had one. It has a blog, because I wanted it to have a blog. I like to write about things that I do, so I’m going to do that on this blog. Where I Started Because I like to do things out of order, the first thing I did was register a domain name. You don’t need to do that first.
